Articles.Content:
If you ware hacker and a "terrorist" and you ware able to hack a satellite, and you make in on re-entry trajectory.

Which celebrity or politician house you would make "accidentally" crash landed a satellite, sorry for my English:-)

Please note that this is Joke.
Honey Boo Boo. That creature is the spawn of Satan.
I'd crash it in bill gates' backyard.

I wouldn't have it land on a person's house, I'd have it land in my backyard where a huge airbag on top of a hydraulic platform would be waiting to catch it. I'd then put some of my own code in there, hook a camera up to it and then i'd contract Orbital Sciences to send it up on a supposed "Weather Observation" mission. Once it was up there I'd spy on multiple international authorities, and sell that intel on the black market annually to the highest bidder.

It'd have to be quite the satellite. Most currently orbiting satellites are so small that they vaporize during re-entry, only the really big ones are likely to have major components survive.

I'd have more fun with it leaving it where it is in orbit, since if it falls it'd be destroyed.

I'd crash it in bill gates' backyard.

But he created windows 7, and the very thing I'm typing with right now!

Mitt romney.

But he created windows 7, and the very thing I'm typing with right now!

Mitt romney.

I would crash it on my Prime Minister (Donald Tusk) or Justin Bieber, spoiled kid and "playback artist"
Ermmm Justin Bieber or Niki Minaj.(I don't care if I spelled either name wrong.) Mainly because they are both poisoning the youth of today with their music.

Ermmm Justin Bieber or Niki Minaj.(I don't care if I spelled either name wrong.) Mainly because they are both poisoning the youth of today with their music.

I agree. This 'swag' epidemic is terrible. So glad that trash wasnt around when I was in highschool.

Edited April 26, 2013 by flyin_ruski

Get the trash stars of this and the past 3 generations in one concert hall, make the event free admission, then crash multiple satellites on it.

Possibly bring the ISS onto them.

You all should be ashamed of yourselves. What did those satellites ever do to you?

( )

You all should be ashamed of yourselves. What did those satellites ever do to you?

( )

They were made easy to hack.
I would crash it on the Pyramids. That would just make everyone mad. +1 Evil prestige

I'd keep it in orbit.

But threaten to deorbit it onto Congress if they get inclined to cut a single penny from NASA's budget.

I would land it in my backyard, repair it, toss in a heavy-duty laser, then contact orbital corp to send it up.

One month later, the capitol building is vaporized by beam coming from space.

Do not cut NASA's budget. Or else.

I would land it in my backyard,

Same, or just crash it in the sea
